rdf:Description.dc:title: Adult literacy in northern Alberta : a background report 1989 a background report /
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Northern Alberta Development Council.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Report by the Northern Alberta Development Council on literacy in the north providing a literature review, an analysis of the literacy situation, discussing literacy learners, projects and programs and identifying eight key northern literacy issues.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Literacy
Adult education
Literacy programs
